titleStmt.title: A briefe declaration of the universalitie of the Church of Christ, and the unitie of the Catholike faith professed therein delivered in a sermon before His Maiestie the 20th. of Iune 1624. at Wansted. By Iames Ussher, Bishop of Meath.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

titleStmt.title: A briefe declaration of the universalitie of the Church of Christ, and the unitie of the Catholike faith professed therein delivered in a sermon before His Maiestie the 20th. of Iune 1624. at Wansted. By Iames Ussher, Bishop of Meath.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson, for Ephraim Dawson, and are to be sold at the Rain-bow neere the Inner Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached before His Maiestie.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Appears at reel 1041 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1368 (Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy).
